abstract: China’s official Xinhua news agency on Tuesday criticized a group of 50 U.S. lawmakers for calling for a probe into Chinese investment in the U.S. steel sector, saying protectionism was rearing its ugly head again.
snippet: China’s official Xinhua news agency on Tuesday criticized a group of 50 U.S. lawmakers for calling for a probe into Chinese investment in the U.S. steel sector, saying protectionism was rearing its ugly head again.
lead_paragraph: China’s official Xinhua news agency on Tuesday criticized a group of 50 United States lawmakers for calling for an investigation into Chinese investment in the American steel industry, saying the action amounted to protectionism, Reuters reported.

headline.main: China Commentary Slams U.S. for Steel Suspicions
